content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compliance is a broad term, and it is very important. It means following the established rules and regulations. It is a part of quality - fulfilling the needs and expectations of customers and other relevant interested parties.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a service provider for hundreds of clients. The quality of our services defines our success and business sustainability. Following clientsâ€™ requirements is one of the most valuable obligations EPAM is committed to.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Constant compliance is a real challenge, but the culture of compliance is a basis for mutual satisfaction and
